package content

Zhuoer Dong

2018-08-12

Source: vignettes/content.Rmd
content.Rmd

Still a draft, to be finished.

library(hgnc)

after you read the vignette('hgnc')

1

It achieves this by two modules: a generic interface which convert between “wide” map and “long” map.

melt_map()

cast_map()

qualify_map() make sure a map is “square”. id-symbol has to fulfill this requirement

For both .., soft can include other columns than ID and Ensembl, which will just be ignored.

2

to make things worse, the separator is not definite (it can be , 、, \\\).

https://github.com/dongzhuoer/rGEO/blob/master/R/platform.R#L187-L194

3

as_symbol

melt hgnc_complete_set.txt.gz

for example, Entrez gene ID
library(magrittr)
# the exact parameter should be character, but integer or numeric is also acceptable
c(23141, 5925) %>% hgnc::as_symbol_from_entrez() #

other feature

to do

So, based on a pre-defined map between id and symbol (such as entrez2symbol), we can transform any user supplied GPL file to standard chip file ready for GSEA
